pageProduct.name: Swisse Magnesium + Sleep Powder 180g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Magnesium + Sleep Powder Lemon & Honey helps improve the quality of sleep, supports muscle relaxation and calms the nervous system. Based on scientific and traditional evidence.

Swisse Ultiboost Magnesium + Sleep Powder is a premium quality formula containing a unique blend of eight nutrients and herbs including choline, inositol, hops and passionflower. As part of your nightly wind-down ritual to promote restful sleep, this convenient powder is specially formulated with:

- Hops (Humulus Lupulus), traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support restful and refreshing sleep, whilst also helping calm the nervous system.
- Magnesium and calcium, which work together to enable the contraction and relaxation of the muscles - magnesium supplementation may also provide support for muscle cramps and spasms when dietary intake of magnesium is low.
- Magnesium to support a healthy nervous system - adequate levels of magnesium are important during times of stress.
- A bioavailable form of magnesium (citrate), which helps magnesium absorption.
- Magnesium to support healthy mood balance and cognitive function.

Great tasting lemon & honey flavour.
Naturally flavoured and sweetened.

Product Claims: Premium quality formula

Size: 180g

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.

Not suitable for infants under the age of twelve months.

Product is packed by weight, not volume. Some setting may occur.

Ingredients

Each scoop (7.5g) contains:

MAGNESIUM (from magnesium citrate nonahydrate) 100mg; MAGNESIUM (from magnesium glycinate dihydrate) 200mg; TOTAL MAGNESIUM 300mg; CALCIUM (from calcium hydrogen phosphate dihydrate) 100mg; POTASSIUM (from dibasic potassium phosphate) 30mg; CHOLINE (from choline bitartrate) 24.98mg; INOSITOL 24.98mg; HOPS (Humulus lupulus extract 80.25mg) equiv. dry fruit 800mg; PASSIONFLOWER (Passiflora incarnata extract 50.25mg) equiv. dry flower & leaf 500mg.

Allergen Free From: Egg| Gluten| Soy| Yeast

Directions

Using the enclosed scoop, mix one level scoop (7.5g) with 100 mL of water (or more water as desired). Consume once daily, approximately 30-60 minutes prior to bed, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal is broken.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Swisse is a carbon neutral company. Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
